==German== {{wikipedia|lang=de}} {{wikipedia|lang=de|Fußball (Sportgerät)}} ===Alternative forms=== * {{l|de|Fussball}} {{qualifier|Switzerland|Liechtenstein|Luxembourg}} ===Etymology=== {{PIE root|de|ped}} From {{affix|de|Fuß|t1=foot|Ball|t2=ball}}, a {{calque|de|en|football|nocap=1}}. Compare the borrowing {{m|de|Football|t=American football}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈfuːsˌbal/}} * {{audio|de|De-Fußball.ogg|audio}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|m|Fußballs|gen2=Fußballes|Fußbälle}} # the sport of [[association football]]; [[soccer]] # the ball with which association football is played: a [[football]], a [[soccer ball]] =====Declension===== {{de-decl-noun-m|(e)s|pl=Fußbälle}}
